Articles.Content:
As soon as Project V was announced, we had a new official forum user, Valentina Kerman. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/139891-Valentina-Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/139891-Valentina-Kerman)

I suspected that there might be some kind of secret early sneak-peek of Val through her profile pic, which of course is a stupid idea. But now, she needs her profile pic! Just like Jeb, Bill, Bob, etc.

EDIT: Posted this in the wrong subforum, had two forum tabs open ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Please move to the KSP Network subforum.
Per her flavor text, we should call her Val.
Val is a much more easy name, I like it.
They got a profile picture for her now.
Val will become confusing with the moon called Vall .

> 
> Val will become confusing with the moon called Vall .

Meh, not really, since Val is pronounced VAL and Vall is pronounced VOHL

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T21:06:16Z" title="02/24/2015 09:06  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by temporalExile**

> 
> Meh, not really, since Val is pronounced VAL and Vall is pronounced VOHL

I have no idea what you mean. Vall is pronounced Vahl.

> 
> Meh, not really, since Val is pronounced VAL and Vall is pronounced VOHL

Pronouncing doesn't have much to do with it: Val and Vall are typographically very similar.

Val Vall: Ã¢â‚¬â€¹See how that could get confusing?

New rep flavor text! "[some Guy] has a reputation that cannot be measured."

Also, a profile pic.
Val for the win! She'll be the first brave pilot to see if my shuttle still works in 1.0 (that's a fat chance)

> 
> Val for the win! She'll be the first brave pilot to see if my shuttle still works in 1.0 (that's a fat chance)

You're getting a moon to fly a shuttle???![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Val has to cut down on her weight, BECAUSE SHE'S A MOONc!!!!!!

> 
> Pronouncing doesn't have much to do with it: Val and Vall are typographically very similar.
> Val Vall: Ã¢â‚¬â€¹See how that could get confusing?

One is orange and the other is blue. Simple as that! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> You're getting a moon to fly a shuttle???![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I don't get it.

> 
> I don't get it.

Vall the moon.

> 
> Meh, not really, since Val is pronounced VAL and Vall is pronounced VOHL

Meh... I wasn't exactly clear about this. When I said Vohl, I was refering to the "all" in "fall" or "mall". At least that's how I've pronouncing it.
